title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Why Boston Blue Should Be The Beginning of Blue Bloods Friday
description: Should Boston Blue be the beginning of Blue Bloods Friday or is one spinoff of the beloved cop/family drama enough? The post Why Boston Blue Should Be The Beginning of Blue Bloods Friday appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jack Ori

title: Cancellation Jitters: FBI: Most Wanted, Grey’s Anatomy, and More Bubble Shows We’re Concerned Could Be Canceled
description: FBI: Most and Grey's Anatomy are two of the six shows we view as being on life support. Check out their chances of renewal. The post Cancellation Jitters: FBI: Most Wanted, Grey’s Anatomy, and More Bubble Shows We’re Concerned Could Be Canceled appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly

title: Jessica Lange Firmly Shuts Down Any Chance of an American Horror Story Return: ‘Oh Christ, No’
description: Don’t hold your breath waiting to see Jessica Lange back on American Horror Story — because you might end up as dead as one of the franchise’s countless murder victims. Lange didn’t mince words when asked by an Irish radio station if she’ll be in the cast of the FX horror anthology’s upcoming 13th season: “Oh […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: In Daredevil: Born Again, Who Does the Late Kamar de los Reyes Play?
description: When Disney+’s Daredevil: Born Again debuts Tuesday, March 4, with its first two episodes (of nine), the second episode will be presented “In Loving Memory of Kamar de los Reyes,” as noted on an opening title card. De los Reyes — who was well known for his run as One Life to Live’s Antonio Vega, […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
